text: They went public with their relationship in June. And on Wednesday, Hilary Duff was playfully jealous as boyfriend Jason Walsh cuddled up to her dog - and not her. The threesome looked to be in bed, with Justin face down and asleep.'Well this isn't fair': On Wednesday, Hilary Duff was playfully jealous as trainer boyfriend Jason Walsh cuddled up to her dog - and not her On Snapchat, Hilary, 29, appeared to be in full make - up as she lamented over her situation.'Well this isn't fair,'the mum - of - one pointed out, as she lied down next to her pooch, Peach.
